title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 424 - Enforcement
content:

State Regulations
§ 424.1 - Violations
§ 424.2 - Access to mines and mine records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 424

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 23-2721, 23-2723

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
